title: Chu Berozu
description:
01. Fukuyama-san.
About a boy and his female classmate in school.

02. An Orchid and a Worm 
03. Raihousha wa Oneesama? (The Visitor's an Ojousama?) 
04. Shuugekisha wa Oneesama? (The Assailant's an Ojousama?)
05. Kimyou Jinruigaku (Funny Anthropology) 
06. Boku no Roza-san. (Our Roza-san.)

07. Atsui Fubuki (Hot Snow Storm)
Ren, an adventurous tomboy, and her old pal Mamoru take off on a skiing trip and soon have nothing but each other to keep warm.

08. Sobakasu Hime (Freckled Princess)
09. Swallowtail
10. Atogaki (Afterword)
